bio: Dr. Wael Badawy is an internationally recognized professor of Electrical and Electronic Engineering with leadership roles at London Metropolitan University, The American University in Cairo, and The Egyptian Russian University. He has received over 73 international awards, been recognized among top business leaders under 40, and holds fellowships and memberships in prestigious academic societies. With two PhDs, multiple postgraduate degrees, extensive research contributions including books, patents, and hundreds of peer-reviewed papers, he has delivered tens of thousands of teaching hours worldwide and maintains professional engineering accreditation in Canada and Egypt alongside senior memberships in major global technical organizations.
